headings.mainIntro: Congratulations on your new website product! The first step in our production process is to learn a little bit more about your business and its goals. This information will help our web team strategize a plan before the next scheduled phone consultation. Your responses here will help us strengthen your online presence.
headings.businessInfoIntro: Let's start with some of the basic business details.

displayedName.question: Business name to be displayed on site
displayedName.contextual: For example, if you represent a private limited company, do you spell your name Ltd. (with a period), Ltd (without the period), LTD (all caps), or Limited (spelled out)?

primaryContact.question: Primary point of contact for our website development team
primaryContact.contextual: Ask yourself, who is best suited to speak about the particulars of the business for the duration of the process?

questions.displayedInfo: Contact information to be displayed on site
questions.otherInfo: Are there any other notes you would like to provide regarding your business information?
